Room.Name: Adamantine Hall
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a great hall with walls made of silvery adamantine metal.
Room.LongDescription: The great hall shines with a radiance of silver adamantine unlike anything you've seen in your life. Even the dwarves would be in awe at such a lavish use of the precious metal. A sharp-eyed dwarf will also notice traces of mithril in the walls. There are two doors leading out of the hall to the east and west. You can hear some gurgling sounds to the east, but there is nothing to the west. The hall is otherwise quite empty.
